availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Urbane V. Williams (Franklin County, Kentucky, physician and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, physician and justice of the peace. Franklin County, Kentucky, native. Son of David Williams and Elizabeth Row Williams. Married to Clementine Wilcox Williams in Franklin County, Kentucky, on May 15, 1862. Father of Pattie Williams. Laborer in Franklin County in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1850. Physician in Franklin County in 1860. Household owned three enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Franklin County in 1860.
